oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Canadiana (CIHM) Collection - Metadata Records
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: University of Alberta Libraries
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This set contains records for 75,574 CIHM microfilmed titles digitized in 2013 through a partnership between Canadiana.org, University of Alberta Libraries, the Canadian Research Knowledge Network (CRKN) and Internet Archive. Format: MARC
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: history
